contents.value:
I run my own business, making a mark, 
It takes hard work and a certain spark.
Profits and losses are part of the game, 
But my income can be irregular, not the same

explaination.value: The poem describes a person who runs their own business, dealing with the challenges of profit and loss. Business owners take ownership of their ventures and are responsible for the success or failure of the business. Their income can be irregular, as it depends on the performance of the business

dialogues.text: Now, let’s assess your knowledge of what we have learned so far.
